name: Not Alone (Ali1397)
description:
So you are in a horror house your task is to solve puzzles and escape the house. There are quite difficult puzzles you need to solve to figure out how can you escape.

Controls: W, A, S, D for movement. To walk upstairs also press space with W. Other help will be available at the game.

So jump in the game now and start figuring out the way out from the haunted house.
